Description: Job Responsibilities:1. Receive and inspect incoming materials and supplies, ensuring they meet the required quality and quantity specifications.2. Organize and maintain the storage area, ensuring proper labeling, categorization, and safe placement of materials.3. Maintain accurate records of all incoming and outgoing materials, including quantities, specifications, and storage locations.4. Coordinate with the procurement team to ensure timely delivery and receipt of materials as per project requirements.5. Monitor inventory levels and generate reports on stock levels, anticipated shortages, and surplus materials.6. Collaborate with the project team to forecast material needs and ensure an adequate supply is available for ongoing construction activities.Skills
Skills: 1. Proven experience for minimum 10 years as a Storekeeper or in a similar role with main contractor
2. Sound knowledge of construction civil materials, their specifications, and quality standards.
3. Familiarity with stock control procedures, inventory management, and record-keeping.
4. Proficiency in computer applications including ERP, inventory management software and MS Office.
Only Immediate joiners and locally available candidates, Candidates must be in UAE.
